mapper.delete: UPDATE pd_use_package_detail SET del_flag = '1' WHERE package_id = #{mainId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, e.number as number, e.name as productName, e.spec as spec, e.version as version, e.spec_quantity as specQuantity, sb.`name` as specUnitName, b.name as unitName, c.name as venderName, d.name as supplierName FROM pd_use_package_detail a left join pd_product e on a.product_id = e.id left join pd_unit b on e.unit_id = b.id left join pd_vender c on e.vender_id = c.id left join pd_supplier d on e.supplier_id = d.id LEFT JOIN pd_unit sb ON e.spec_unit_id = sb.id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' and a.package_id = #{mainId}
